function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Collection and tracking of individual movement data","Impact":"Invasion of privacy, potential misuse of personal data","Mitigation":"Obtain informed consent, anonymize data, and adhere to data protection regulations","Technologies":"Anonymization tools, encryption, and secure data storage","People":"Individuals being tracked and logged","Owner":"Data protection authorities, research ethics committees"},{"Description":"Identification of high-risk zones and creation of risk heat-map","Impact":"Stigmatization of certain areas, potential discrimination","Mitigation":"Use anonymized data, focus on positive interventions, and involve local communities in decision-making","Technologies":"Anonymization tools, community engagement platforms","People":"Residents of high-risk zones","Owner":"Local government, community organizations"},{"Description":"Use of environmental noise for visualization of heat-map","Impact":"Misinterpretation of data, misleading risk assessment","Mitigation":"Provide clear guidelines for interpretation, validate data accuracy, and use multiple visualization methods","Technologies":"Data validation tools, visualization software","People":"Health sector policymakers, governors","Owner":"Public health authorities, data analysts"}]}
